group_1.textCenter: (Whew...okay! Gonna give Hayato the@chocolate I made...)

group_1.narration: I decided that on my way to school...

group_1.textCenter: (A...ah, it's noon! Gotta watch for the@right moment...)

group_1.textLeft: Hayato! Let's go grab some grub!

group_1.textCenter: (I-it's fine...[wait:0.8][chara:302301:cheek_1][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]I can catch him after classes @are done!)

group_1.narration: I messed up the timing at lunch.

group_1.textCenter: (Well, classes are over... I'll just wait@until everyone goes home.)

group_1.textLeft: Hey everyone! I'm gonna hand out my@chocolates now!

group_1.textCenter: (Oh no, now what's happening? I guess I@have to wait 'til this is over...)

group_1.textRight: Oh, there you are! Aimi! The teacher @wants you to do something for the class...

group_1.textLeft: (I'll give him the chocolate, and then I'll@tell him "I like you.")
(I-if I tell Hayato I like him, I wonder@what he'll say...?)
(If he's like, "oh, I like you too" then I@might just die!)
(Heh...hee hee...tee hee hee...)
Wha...? [chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302301:cheek_0][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:302301:lipSynch_1]Y-yeah, I was! No problem!

group_1.narration: And, after school, I finally got my chance.

group_1.textRight: Aimi? You're not going home yet?

group_1.textLeft: Y-yeah...just forgot something...

group_1.narration: Lucky! It's just the two of us!

group_1.textLeft: (It's now or never, Aimi! Give him the@chocolate!)
Hayato! [chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302301:cheek_2][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:302301:lipSynch_1]Um, I...!

group_1.textRight: Ms. Eri! What are you idling around here@for?!

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Did I do something wrong...?

group_1.textRight: Didn't I ask you to do a few things? I told@someone to pass the message on to you.

group_1.textLeft: Now that you mention it, someone might've@told me that...

group_1.textRight: What am I to do with you... Come on.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Bwuh?! W-wait a minute!
Wait, pleeeeeease! Just a minute, or@30 seconds, tops...!

group_1.textRight: Certainly not! Everyone is waiting because@of you!

group_1.textLeft: But...but...! This is the most important@day of the year!
[bgEffect:shakeSmall]I don't wannaaa! [chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302301:eyeClose_1][bgEffect:shakeLarge][chara:302301:lipSynch_1]I! Didn't! Get! To! Give!@My! Chocolate! To! Hiiim!
And that was my memory of the last@Valentine's Day at school...
[chara:302301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wait, don't tell me you were there when @all of that happened?

group_1.textRight: Yes. Just by chance. It was...unforgettable.
Why, what did you do, Aimi?

group_1.textLeft: Ya know, that's all in the past! It can stay@there!
We're talking about this year! I HAVE to@give him chocolate this year!

group_1.textRight: Oh, right... [chara:301601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301601:motion_200][chara:301601:cheek_0][chara:301601:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:301601:lipSynch_1]This year is more important.
So...do you have a plan in mind?

group_1.textLeft: I've spent days thinking... But no, I don't.
And, even if the teacher hadn't stopped me@last year, I might've been too nervous...
The chances of me being too psyched out @to give him the chocolate were pretty high.

group_1.textRight: If giving it to him directly is daunting,@[chara:302901:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302901:lipSynch_1]what about...indirectly?

group_1.textLeft: Whoa! Like, how?!
Uh...delivery?

group_1.textRight: Sending Valentine's Day chocolate through@the mail...
Um, I dunno, I'm not so sure...
If you lived far away, then maybe[chara:301601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.1]...[wait:0.3][chara:301601:motion_0][chara:301601:lipSynch_1]but,@you know...?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.
If it were you, how would you do it,@Masara?

group_1.textRight: Me? [chara:302901:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302901:cheek_0][chara:302901:face_mtn_ex_000.exp.json][chara:302901:lipSynch_1]I'd just give it to him like normal.

group_1.textLeft: Normal?
Th-then show me!

group_1.textCenter: Here. This chocolate is for you.

group_1.textLeft: That is normal...
But it's also kinda...cool.
...Not really, no.
What is it?
